description:
Make an exact copy of your PC disks by creating a whole disk backup

Active@ Disk Image is a disk image software that makes an exact copy of any PC
disk (HDD, SSD, USB, CD, DVD, Blu-ray etc.) and stores it into a folder. The
disk images may be used for backups, PC upgrades or disk duplication purposes.

In case of computer failure, a backup image may be used to recover your computer
system or find and restore any necessary files from within an image.
- Bug fixes and stability improvements
- Improved Boot Disk Creator: save pre-configured settings to boot disk
- The latest WinPE-based Active@ Boot Disk (Windows 11 - 24H2 code base)
